snippet: A revised federal statement on the Keystone XL pipeline offers no environmental reasons that it should not be built, giving President Obama political cover to approve it.
abstract: Revised federal statement on 1,700-mile Keystone XL pipeline offers no environmental reasons that it should not be built; 2,000-page document also makes no statement on whether pipeline is in the United States’ economic and energy interests, determination to be made later this year by Pres Obama.

byline.contributor: Dan Frosch contributed reporting from Denver.

lead_paragraph: A revised federal statement on the Keystone XL pipeline offers no environmental reasons that it should not be built, giving President Obama political cover to approve it.

headline.main: Report May Ease Path for New Pipeline
headline.print_headline: Report May Ease Path for New Pipeline
